summary: Gen Z, or Zoomers, are the generation born between 1997 and 2012, following Millennials. They are the first to grow up with the internet and digital tech, earning the nickname "digital natives." Gen Z tends to have lower rates of teenage pregnancies and alcohol consumption. They are more focused on academics and job prospects. This generation also experiences more screen time, which can affect their health and habits. Globally, Gen Z girls are entering puberty earlier, and the generation overall faces more mental health issues and sleep deprivation.
title: Generation Z
